articles.title: Cipla shares rally 8% to hit 52-week high on strong Q3 earnings - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Cipla also clocked in its highest ever quarterly revenue for the North America business, driven by strong respiratory season.
articles.content: Shares of Cipla rallied as much as 8 percent to hit a 52-week high of Rs 1,425 in trade on January 23, a day after the company reported a strong performance in Q3 on all key parameters of profit, rev… [+1795 chars]

articles.title: Layoffs In US Soared 98% In 2023 And It Could Get Worse This Year, Report Claims - NDTV
articles.description: US companies planned 721,677 job cuts last year, a 98% jump from 363,832 layoffs reported in 2022, a new report published by professional outplacement firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas has revealed.
articles.content:
Several high-profile tech companies, inlcuding Meta, slashed jobs last year. (Representative pic)

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Air India operates country’s first Airbus A350 from Bengaluru airport - Times of India
articles.description: Air India operated the country's first Airbus A350 aircraft from Kempegowda International Airport to Mumbai with 297 passengers onboard. The airline plans to operate the aircraft in Bengaluru, Chennai, Delhi, Hyderabad, and Mumbai.
